meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of Tuesday
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite marted dress every Tuesday.
meanings.sent2: The marted meeting is always full of energy and excitement.
meanings.sent3: The marted cupcakes were a hit at the office party.
meanings.sent4: The marted sky was painted with hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The marted theme made the event feel special and unique.

meanings.definition: a market or fair, especially one held on a Tuesday
meanings.sent1: The marted was bustling with vendors selling fresh produce.
meanings.sent2: Visiting the marted is a weekly tradition for the locals.
meanings.sent3: At the marted, you can find unique handmade crafts.
meanings.sent4: The marted was a hive of activity with people bargaining and chatting.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked goods filled the marted.
